alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Washburn, east central Burnett and southwestern Sawyer Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Couderay, to near Shell Lake, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Radisson and Couderay around 555 PM CDT. Exeland around 600 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
